LG NanoCell 75 Series 55NANO75 55" 4K UHD Smart Television

The LG NanoCell 75 Series 55NANO75 55 Inch TV utilizes nanoparticles, our own distinctive Nanotechnology, to filter and refine color, removing impurities from RGB wavelengths. LG NanoCell is an LED that enhances your movies, shows, and videos with true, intense color and dimensional sound. ThinQ AI plus Google Assistant and Alexa built-in let you control your entire connected home. Experience gaming on NanoCell. Game Optimizer gives you easier access to all your game settings and you'll get Auto Low-Latency Mode plus HGiG for a detailed gaming picture. The LG NanoCell 75 Series 55NANO75 55 Inch TV comes with no parts warranty.

full_description:
LG 75NANO95 75-inch NanoCell 8K HDR Cinema Screen Design Smart AI ThinQ Full Array Television

The LG 75NANO95 75-inch Smart Television utilizes NanoCell technology, which uses 1 nm nanoparticles to generate a real color. NanoCell TV now comes in 8K resolution, delivering outstanding image quality with enhanced color. Real 8K LED is now available. LG's 8K NanoCell TVs adhere to the industry standard for 8K resolution. It has four times the resolution of 4K, as well as Nano Colour's realistic, lifelike color, Nano Accuracy's exact color at broad angles, and the deeper darkness and contrast of carefully controlled lighting. Our AI processor enhances the realism of a true 8K image. The 9 Gen 3 AI Processor 8K is designed exclusively for 8K performance. You don't have to do anything to experience breathtaking video and audio. With 4-step noise reduction, AI Picture Pro, AI Sound Pro, and AI 8K Upscaling, our sophisticated CPU handles everything for you. Everything you perceive should be elevated. Any content resolution may be upscaled to 8K, which corresponds to nearly 33 million pixels, using Deep Learning and AI. The technology is so advanced that you may confuse non-8K for actual 8K. Dolby increases the oomph, propelling their best-in-class HDR format to new dramatic heights. Dolby Vision IQ intelligently changes image settings based on environmental illumination and content genre. Dolby Atmos immerses you in the action with multidimensional surround sound that appears to flow all around you. Film fans may discover what filmmakers had in mind. Filmmaker Mode is a mode that values the craft. With automated image and processing settings, it delivers a director's cinematic vision to your TV. LG NanoCell TVs deliver maximum HDR image quality by supporting major HDR formats such as HDR 10 Pro and HLG Pro. It enables you to see your stuff in realistic high definition. The LG NanoCell TV provides you with a competitive advantage in gaming. AI-powered image quality brings you to the present moment. Gaming features and cutting-edge technology, such as HGiG and VRR, give you an advantage with minimal lag, higher refresh rates, and more responsive gaming. HDMI 2.1 standards are met by a greater frame rate, ALLM (Auto Low Latency Mode), and eARC (Enhanced Audio Return Channel). These new capabilities enable faster-moving, higher-resolution information as well as smooth, synchronized visuals. It provides a more realistic game experience. LG NanoCell 8K TVs have successfully passed HDMI Compliance Test Specification testing at the HDMI Authorized Test Center (2.1d). High Dynamic Range (HDR) isn't just for films. HDR gaming on LG TVs immerses gamers in the action for a new degree of immersion. LG has collaborated with some of the most prominent game developers and technology firms to provide an unrivaled HDR gaming experience. It's never been easier to connect LG Bluetooth speakers for wireless surround sound. Connect up to two speakers, including the LG XBoom Speakers, for real surround sound with no wires visible. The LG 75NANO95 75-inch NanoCell 8K Smart Television comes with No Parts Warranty

LG C2 65-inch evo OLED 4K UHD Smart Television With Alexa

The LG C2 65-inch evo OLED 4K UHD Smart Television has been improved with brighter colors, a new, more sophisticated CPU, and a leaner, narrower bezel. LG self-lit OLED pixels produce stunning image quality with infinite contrast, perfect darkness, and over a billion colors, which are now even brighter. The LG C2 65-inch evo OLED 4K UHD Smart TV boasts an a9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K, which makes the impossible possible by automatically adjusting your settings to increase the image and sound quality based on what you're watching. FILMMAKER MODE immerses you in the action the way the directors intended, while Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos enhance every moment for the ultimate home theater experience. Use NVIDIA G-SYNC, FreeSync Premium, and VRR to experience real-time action, as well as the LG Game Optimizer and 4 HDMI 2.1 connections to get (and stay) in the action. LG Brightness Booster is a brilliant idea that combines our a9 processor and superior picture algorithms to provide you with brighter images.

α9 Gen 5 AI Processor 4K

LG C2 65" evo OLED 4K UHD Smart TV comes with the latest α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K, engineered exclusively for LG OLED to automatically adjust your settings to improve picture and sound qualities based on whatever you’re watching.

Next Level of Gaming

LG C2 65-inch OLED TV comes with NVIDIA G-SYNC, FreeSync Premium, and VRR for real-time action. The LG Game Optimizer and 4 HDMI 2.1 ports to get you (and keep you) in the action.

full_description:
LG evo C3 65 Inch OLED 4K Smart Television with Alexa Built-in

The LG evo C3 65-inch OLED 4K Smart Television, is a state-of-the-art entertainment centerpiece designed to redefine your viewing experience. With Alexa Built-in, this TV combines cutting-edge technology, stunning visuals, and seamless connectivity to provide you with an immersive entertainment experience like never before. Powered by the exclusive α9 AI Processor Gen6, the LG evo C3 ensures that you enjoy breathtaking picture quality and outstanding performance. This processor uses AI-assisted deep learning to analyze your content and select the optimal picture and sound settings, enhancing your viewing experience. The Brightness Booster technology ensures that you get a luminous picture with high contrast, even in well-lit rooms. Say goodbye to glare and washed-out visuals, and immerse yourself in vivid, lifelike images. For a decade running, LG OLED TVs have held the title of the world's #1 OLED brand, setting the industry standard for innovation and excellence. With over 8.3 million self-lit OLED pixels, LG OLED TVs deliver brilliant colors and perfect blacks, providing a cinematic viewing experience. The LG OLED evo C3 features an ultra-slim design that seamlessly blends into any room. Its almost invisible bezel ensures an uninterrupted viewing experience, making it a stylish addition to your living space. When not in use, transform your LG OLED evo C3 into a captivating art gallery. Display paintings, photos, and other content to seamlessly integrate the TV into your home decor. With webOS 23 and LG ThinQ AI, you'll spend less time searching and more time enjoying your favorite content. Whether it's fitness, sports, or entertainment, the next generation of AI technology simplifies your viewing experience. The Magic Remote makes navigation a breeze, ensuring you find what you're looking for effortlessly. Access over 300 free channels instantly with LG Channels, providing a wide range of content to suit your preferences and keep you entertained. Experience movies exactly as the director intended with LG's FILMMAKER MODE, immersing you in the heart of the action and preserving the artistic integrity of the film. Elevate your home theater experience with Dolby Vision for stunning color, contrast, and brightness, and Dolby Atmos for enveloping, cinema-quality sound that transports you right into the heart of the story. The LG evo C3 65 Inch OLED 4K Smart TV is the epitome of entertainment excellence, combining cutting-edge technology, stunning visuals, and smart features to deliver an unparalleled viewing experience. Whether you're watching your favorite content, displaying artwork, or simply enjoying some downtime, this TV is designed to meet and exceed your expectations. Elevate your entertainment experience with LG OLED excellence.
